answer: If you cannot log in, try the 'Forgot Password' option to reset your password.
If your account is locked or suspended, please contact the support team via chat or support@example.com.
You can create a new event by clicking the 'Create Event' button on your dashboard.
To update an event, go to your event list, select the event, and edit its description or details.
To delete an event, select the event from your list and click the 'Delete' button. Confirm the action to remove it permanently.
You can view all your events by navigating to the 'My Events' page, where all upcoming and past events are listed.
The system supports multiple users. Each user can manage their own events, and permissions are applied to keep events private.
If you forgot your password, use the 'Reset Password' link on the login page to receive an email and create a new password.
For enhanced security, enable Multi-Factor Authentication (MFA) on your account. You will receive a code via email or authenticator app each time you log in.
All backend API endpoints require proper authentication (JWT or OAuth 2.0) and are accessible only over HTTPS.
You can reach our helpdesk through the chat interface or email support@example.com. If your question cannot be handled automatically, it will be escalated to a human agent.
The system features an AI-powered FAQ bot that can answer common questions about account management, events, and system functionality.
You can also contact support via voice using the integrated web voice interface or by calling our support line.
Event descriptions can be added or updated to provide more context for attendees. Use the 'Edit' button to update the information.
You can enable notifications for your events to receive reminders via email or in-app messages.
Access to protected resources is only allowed for authenticated users. Please log in and ensure your account has proper permissions.
All communications between the frontend and backend are encrypted using TLS. Unencrypted connections are not allowed.
The system is designed with security in mind and mitigates common risks including those listed in OWASP Top 10.
If you encounter a bug or technical problem, please report it via the support chat or email support@example.com.
You can update your account details and profile information by navigating to the 'Settings' page.
The system provides a calendar view to visualize your events. Use it to plan and track your schedule efficiently.
Helpdesk agents have a specific role that allows them to access the admin chat interface and respond to user messages.
